class.name: NetcdfInterpretor
class.documentation: This object contains this attributes to set how to load the data from the file. It is possible to load only a subarray of the data, by setting the dimensions.

parameter.name: netcdf_filename
parameter.documentation: Path of the file to be read

parameter.name: netcdf_dimension_setting
parameter.documentation: Extract only of a subset of variables [ex: level:100:500]

parameter.name: netcdf_time_dimension_setting
parameter.documentation: Extract only the specified times : date specified in Human readable format YYY-MM-DD HH:MM:00

parameter.name: netcdf_level_dimension_setting
parameter.documentation: Extract only the specified level

parameter.name: netcdf_number_dimension_setting
parameter.documentation: Extract only the specified number

parameter.name: netcdf_dimension_setting_method
parameter.documentation: Method used to specify how to interpret the extraction of a subset, the range can by specified by value or by index

parameter.name: netcdf_latitude_variable
parameter.documentation: Variable name representing the latitude dimension

parameter.name: netcdf_longitude_variable
parameter.documentation: Variable name representing the longitude dimension

parameter.name: netcdf_speed_component_variable
parameter.documentation: Variable name representing the speed component of the vector

parameter.name: netcdf_direction_component_variable
parameter.documentation: Variable name representing the direction component of the vector

parameter.name: netcdf_value_variable
parameter.documentation: Variable to plot

parameter.name: netcdf_x_component_variable
parameter.documentation: x_component for vector plotting

parameter.name: netcdf_y_component_variable
parameter.documentation: y_component for vector plotting

parameter.name: netcdf_colour_component_variable
parameter.documentation: Variable name representing the colour component of the vector ( in case of coloured wind)

parameter.name: netcdf_field_automatic_scaling
parameter.documentation: Apply an automatic scaling, if needed

parameter.name: netcdf_field_scaling_factor
parameter.documentation: Scaling factor to multiply the field value by

parameter.name: netcdf_field_add_offset
parameter.documentation: Offset added to the field values

parameter.name: netcdf_missing_attribute
parameter.documentation: Attribute indicating the value used to indicate a missing value in the data

parameter.name: netcdf_reference_date
parameter.documentation: attribute indicating the reference date

parameter.name: netcdf_field_suppress_below
parameter.documentation: Values in the input field(s) below this value are to be suppressed, i.e. not to be taken into consideration for plotting purposes

parameter.name: netcdf_field_suppress_above
parameter.documentation: Values in the input field(s) above this value are to be suppressed, i.e not to be taken into consideration for plotting purposes

parameter.name: netcdf_x_variable
parameter.documentation: Variable name for the x values

parameter.name: netcdf_x2_variable
parameter.documentation: Variable name for the auxiliary x values (used in CurveArea)

parameter.name: netcdf_y_variable
parameter.documentation: Variable name for the y values

parameter.name: netcdf_y2_variable
parameter.documentation: Variable name for the auxiliary y values (used in CurveArea)

parameter.name: netcdf_x_auxiliary_variable
parameter.documentation: variable can used to define geoline definition.

parameter.name: netcdf_x_geoline_convention
parameter.documentation: Geoline Convention used lonlat or latlon

parameter.name: netcdf_y_geoline_convention
parameter.documentation: Geoline Convention used lonlat or latlon

parameter.name: netcdf_y_auxiliary_variable
parameter.documentation: variable can used to define geoline definition.

parameter.name: netcdf_matrix_primary_index
parameter.documentation: Primary index latitude/longitude
